item.title: Credits
item.description: Thanks for the usage of the following in the development of this site: Icons: Earth by Juan Pablo Bravo from the Noun Project (https://thenounproject.com/bravo/collection/small-simple/) Site Theme: Kube licensed under MIT.

item.title: New Blog
item.description: I have long wanted to blog more consistently but always got bogged down in what service to use, and how to use it… or whether I should wait until I could build one myself. Fortunately I came to my senses and no longer think building it from scratch myself makes sense, so I went with a happy medium and am using Hugo and firebase for my needs. Hopefully this helps me learn a bit of website management as well as some more ‘coding’ skills in my quest for a better understanding of the web.

item.title: About Me
item.description: My name is Cam I like stuff - this is my website so that I can keep track of the many things that I do in the average day. Cheers
